description: The government has done a molecule-by-molecule mapping of Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs) imported from China to ramp up domestic production and imports from third party sources in view of the supply chain disruptions due to the coronavirus epidemic.
title: Govt completes molecular mapping of active pharma ingredients

description: Like China, India has a high rate of internal migration. In the 2011 census, 450 million people moved from one area to another in search of opportunity. Many commute daily from their villages to work in the cities. That could make it harder to contain an outbreak to one locality, as China has attempted to do by locking down the entire state of Hubei.
title: Coronavirus spread puts densely populated India on high alert

description: The government has been examining the impact of the shutdown in China on the pharmaceutical sector in India. The DoP has also asked the country’s drug regulatory authority, Central Drugs Standard Control Organization, to examine to what degree India depends on China for bulk drugs, possible shortages of molecules and measures that can be taken to keep the situation under control.
title: Coronavirus outbreak: Drug pricing regulator asks companies to give information on price, inventory

description: Qure.ai will use this new capital to drive geographical expansion, expand product portfolio and support regulatory clearances.
title: Qure.ai raises $16 million from Sequoia India

description: The licensing pact for Ryaltris has been signed between the company's Swiss subsidiary, Glenmark Specialty SA and Hikma Pharmaceuticals PLC (Hikma).
title: Glenmark inks licensing pact with Hikma for commercialisation of nasal spray Ryaltris in US

description: The United States Food and Drug Administration (USFDA) issued a Form 483 with two observations to Biocon’ Bengaluru API facility.
title: Biocon shares fall as USFDA issues Form 483 for Bengaluru facility

description: Officials aware of the developments say Morgan Stanley is readying the share sale process.
title: NCLT clears GSK-HUL merger, paves way for GSK Plc’s exit through huge block deal

description: The Medical Technology Association of India (MTaI) on Wednesday said its member companies are ready to brace up for any shortages in medical devices and equipment arising out of scarcity of raw materials from China due to coronavirus outbreak.
title: MTaI members ready to brace up for any shortage of medical devices

description: Drug firm Cipla Ltd said that the US health regulator has issued a warning letter to the company for its manufacturing facility in Goa.
title: USFDA issues warning letter to Cipla for Goa manufacturing facility

description: China on Wednesday permitted India to send its special flight with around 15 tonnes of medical relief to Wuhan, the epicentre of the coronavirus epidemic.
title: India sends special flight with medical relief to China
